meanings.definition: A numerical quantity that is not a whole number, typically represented by a numerator and a denominator.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to add fractions together.
meanings.sent2: She divided the pizza into fractions to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cake was cut into fractions, but someone took a bigger piece!
meanings.sent4: His attention was divided into fractions between work and family.
meanings.sent5: The concept of fractions can be tricky, but practice makes perfect.

meanings.definition: A small part or item forming a piece of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully painted each fraction of the mural.
meanings.sent2: Every fraction of the puzzle was essential to complete the picture.
meanings.sent3: The team worked together, each member contributing a valuable fraction.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, brightening every fraction of the space.
meanings.sent5: The tiny ant carried a fraction of the leaf, showing incredible strength.
